channel.title: Starting area
channel.description: can someone make me a thing to go in a file so a person will spawn at a difrent home i went threw the whole server files its not in thier it spawns in falador its a 474

item.title: Starting area
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

Sometimes, the server doesn’t use a specific set of coords for their teleports (which pisses the hell out of me when I try to change it).
The coords for the starting area probably looks something like this…

absx = 3000 + misc.random(3)
absy = 3000 + misc.random(3)

Try to find the lowest possible y coordinate and x coordinate that you start off at and search your server for that.

Read full topic
